Container.Name: nextcloud
Container.Overview: Nextcloud[br][br] A safe home for all your data. Access and share your files, calendars, contacts, mail and more from any device, on your terms.

Config.Name: traefik.enable
Config.Description: Set to true to enable this container in Traefik.

Config.Name: traefik.backend
Config.Description: Overrides the container name by foo in the generated name of the backend.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.rule
Config.Description: Overrides the default frontend rule. Default: Host:{containerName}.{domain} if you are using docker-compose.

Config.Name: traefik.port
Config.Description: Registers this port. Useful when the container exposes multiples ports.

Config.Name: traefik.docker.network
Config.Description: Overrides the default docker network to use for connections to the container.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.SSLRedirect
Config.Description: Forces the frontend to redirect to SSL if a non-SSL request is sent.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.STSSeconds
Config.Description: Sets the max-age of the STS header.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.browserXSSFilter
Config.Description: Adds the X-XSS-Protection header with the value 1; mode=block.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.contentTypeNosniff
Config.Description: Adds the X-Content-Type-Options header with the value nosniff.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.forceSTSHeader
Config.Description: Adds the STS header to non-SSL requests.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.SSLHost
Config.Description: This setting configures the hostname that redirects will be based on. Default is NOTHING, which is the same host as the request.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.STSIncludeSubdomains
Config.Description: Adds the IncludeSubdomains section of the STS header.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.STSPreload
Config.Description: Adds the preload flag to the STS header.

Config.Name: traefik.frontend.headers.customFrameOptionsValue
Config.Description: Overrides the X-Frame-Options header with the custom value.
